info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 27 at 1:44PM EDT until July 27 at 2:15PM EDT by NWS Albany
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 215 PM EDT FOR CENTRAL RENSSELAER COUNTY... At 144 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Center Brunswick, or near Troy, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Troy, Grafton, Berlin, Wyantskill, Averill Park, West Sand Lake, Center Brunswick, Wynantskill, North Greenbush, Brunswick, Sand Lake, Hoosick, Poestenkill, South Troy, Lansingburgh, East Poestenkill, Petersburg Junction, Quackenkill, Albia and Babcock Lake. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
